alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 02 at 1:57AM PDT until September 02 at 4:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR SOUTHEASTERN INYO COUNTY... At 157 AM PDT, Flash flooding from earlier thunderstorms in the southern portion of Death Valley will remain a threat on State Route 127 south between Death Valley Junction and Shoshone. Only isolated light showers were persisting overnight. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of normally dry washes, roads and low- lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... State Route 127 between Death Valley Junction and Shoshone. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
